user.biography: The official Instagram page for Sony’s Xperia Global. For speed and beyond in a smartphone – discover the all-new Xperia 1 III.

node.text:
As Japan celebrates Marine Day this July, Cristina Mittermeier, Xperia 1 III fan and founder of @sealegacy says: "Oceans are the lifeblood of Earth. If they go, we go with them."

#Sony #Xperia #SonyXperia #ShotOnXperia #RoadToZero #Sustainability

node.text:
We're heading back to the Netherlands to witness its vast sea of colourful tulips - a truly breathtaking sight with #TravelByXperia ambassador and landscape photographer @albertdrosphotography and #Xperia1III. 

#TravelByXperia #Xperia1III #Netherlands #MobilePhotography #StayHome #VirtualTravel

node.title: See the Netherlands’ terrific tulips with photographer Albert Dros

node.text:
Without leaving our homes, #TravelByXperia has allowed us to witness the beauty and wonder of our world. Thanks to our brilliant ambassadors and followers for a magical journey so far... 

Share your photos with #TravelByXperia for the chance to feature next! In order for us to repost, the following conditions must be met:

Capture with an Xperia device​
Please follow @SonyXperia​
Please post using the following hashtags:​
#TravelByXperia​ 
The name of your country or region, e.g. #France​
The name of your Xperia device, e.g. #Xperia5II​

Read and accept our Terms & Conditions
If we choose to feature your photo, we will contact you first via Instagram Direct.

#TravelByXperia #Xperia1III #MobilePhotography #StayHome

node.text:
Based in Japan, meet our #TravelByXperia ambassadors and candid outdoor photographers @ippei.janine – on their first adventure with Xperia 1 III! With a passion for exploring while capturing the ancient spirit of Japan, Ippei and Janine carry Xperia 1 III to help them tell their story. 
 
#TravelByXperia #Xperia1III #Japan #Wakayama #KumanoKodo #DaimonZaka #MobilePhotography #StayHome #VirtualTravel #SonyXperia

node.title: Meet mysterious Japan through Xperia 1 III with Ippei & Janine Photography

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Sony Mobile on July 23, 2021. May be an image of beach, nature and ocean.

node.text:
Taken with #Xperia1III, this dreamy scene of a turquoise Taiwanese sea comes courtesy of #TravelByXperia ambassador and pro photographer Hsiang (@rookie030)! By shooting in RAW, Hsiang was able to edit this beautiful image to his postcard-worthy style.​

Your adventures could feature next! When posting on Instagram, don’t forget to tag #TravelByXperia, the name of your country or region (e.g. #Taiwan), and the name of your Xperia device (e.g. #Xperia5II). ​

​For your image to be eligible for reposting, you must also ensure the following: ​

✔️You capture with an Xperia device ​
✔️You follow @SonyXperia on Instagram ​
✔️You read and accept our Terms & Conditions ​

If we choose to feature your photo, we will contact you first via Instagram Direct. ​

#TravelByXperia #Xperia1III #Taiwan #MobilePhotography #StayHome #VirtualTravel #SonyXperia #SonyCamera​

node.text:
Captured with #Xperia1III – if these iconic Parisian scenes aren’t enough to spur your inner traveller, we don’t know what are! Our #TravelByXperia ambassador and city photographer Laurent (@parisexplorer) used Photography Pro to adjust the shutter speed and achieve this subtle motion blur – with stunning results!​

​Image 1 // 16mm | 1/60s | f/2.2 | ISO64​
Image 2 // 24mm | 1/2500s | f/1.7 | ISO64​
